summary: A children's doll house, which is a miniature of the infamous haunted Long Island house, is given to a young girl where the demonic evil soon comes out to cause more terror.
cast: Robin Thomas|Starr Andreeff|Allen Cutler|Rachel Duncan|Jarrett Lennon|Clayton Murray|Franc Ross|Lenore Kasdorf|Lisa Robin Kelly
